display_name: Filtered: Overall RDI at 5% desat or arousal
description: RDI with Arousals at 5% desat  [(Total number of apneas and hypopneas with arousal associated with >= 5% desat) / (hours of sleep)]
calculations: 60*(hremba5 +hroa5 + hnrba5 + hnroa5 +carba5+ caroa5 + canba5 + canoa5 + oarba5 + oaroa5 + oanba5 + oanoa5 + marbpa5 + maropa5 + manrbpa5 + manropa5) / slpprdp
